channel.title: How can I crack this?
channel.description:
http://rapidshare.de/files/48003803/_Calculatem_Pro__v5.2.64__Poker_Odds_Software_Full_Install_FIXED.zip.html
How can I crack this. I'm an absolute noob at cracking, I can't do anything more than real simple cracks. I really wanted to try this software out but they don't even offer a trial, this fag shit wants a license key. I tried debugging in ollydbg, but it throws an exception when olly attaches itself. (Probably some anti-debug routine). If anyone can sort of point me in the right direction i'd appreciate it. It also says shit like 'connecting to license server' but when I sniffed it, I saw no packets going to the server when I click 'register', the only packets I saw were when it was trying to get me to update/buy etc.
Any help is appreciated!

Why bump a thread when the solution has already been found… May aswell be locked to stop this post count whore posting again.

Read full topic

item.title: How can I crack this?
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

[quote=“ownagesbot, post:11, topic:292280”][quote author=Speljohan link=topic=386158.msg2897832#msg2897832 date=1249329397]

[quote author=ownagesbot link=topic=386158.msg2896333#msg2896333 date=1249242150]
Dam, this shit has some gay license server after the serial crap. Oh well, this version atleast bypasses the first part and allows me to attach a debugger, so myb i can crack it now.
[/quote]Find server ip, trace packets, reroute to localhost and write a replication server.
[/quote]Thats what I was going to do, but doesn’t help when you don’t have a valid serial to compare the result to. I got this soft anyway, just stopped being a tight ass and made a deposit on poker lel.[/quote]
The serial I PM’d was for a different version (which was included). You can try using that.

Read full topic

item.title: How can I crack this?
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

[quote=“ownagesbot, post:7, topic:292280”][quote author=T4_ link=topic=386158.msg2895981#msg2895981 date=1249223296]

Check whether the exe is packed (Use IDAPro / SoftIce / CheatEngine). If it is packed you’re pretty much screwed, because it’s likely to use public key cryptography to protect the actual code, which essentially means it can’t be cracked without one working license key to work with.

PMed a key and its corresponding executable.
[/quote]You’re a legend man. Thanks! I did fancy learning how to crack but wanted the software more than anything! Did you crack it yourself? To zstars: it wasn’t packed, but had some shitty anti-debug shit from what i could tell.[/quote]
I didn’t crack it, I thought that was stated in the private message. :\

Read full topic

[/quote]
PMed a key and its corresponding executable. :)[/quote]You’re a legend man. Thanks! I did fancy learning how to crack but wanted the software more than anything! Did you crack it yourself? To zstars: it wasn’t packed, but had some shitty anti-debug shit from what i could tell.

Read full topic
